name: Hoshikui - Fantasy Dress Up Action
description:
A popular cute character "Hoshikui", known for illustration, Line stickers, goods, has been made into a game! This is a heartwarming action game to have an adventure in the various world of Hoshikui while collecting stars! We got new characters and you can dress up them!!

Design by Mr.Shoutaro
Mr.Shoutaro who is the creator of Hoshikui designed characters, costumes and backgrounds.
Let's enjoy unique worldview of Hoshikui!

Action
Just tapping the screen to play game. Hoshikui jumps every time you tap. If you tap when Hoshikui takes a star in the air, she can jump higher!
Collect many stars.

Friends
You will get new friends by clearing stages and collecting stars.
New many characters designed by Mr.Shoutaro appear!
You can use friends as player characters.

Costumes
Get Hoshikuis into costumes which suit them.
They take action with their costumes on!

Connected Facebook and Twitter
Post a lot of cute Hoshikuis!

Recommended OS
AndroidOS 4.1 or later
